overlay: Import control on the sale of seal products
summary:
In order to protect seals, which are sentient beings that can experience pain, distress, fear and other forms of suffering, you may not import seals (specimens of all species of pinnipeds (Phocidae, Otariidae and Odobenidae or seal products, unless specific conditions are met.

‘Seal product’ means all products, either processed or unprocessed, deriving or obtained from seals, including meat, oil, blubber, organs, raw fur skins and fur skins, tanned or dressed, including fur skins assembled in plates, crosses and similar forms, and articles made from fur skins.
